ipBlockInformationSubtitle: In this section, you can customise the public information on your IP block (information on the WHOIS database).
ipBlockInformationOrganisationOnGoingCha: Reassigning the IP block organisation... Please wait a few moments.
ipBlockInformationUpdateSuccessMessage: The {{ip}} IP block details have been updated.
ipBlockInformationUpdateErrorMessage: An error occurred while updating the {{ip}} IP block details: {{error}}
ipBlockInformationOrgUpdateSuccessMessag: Assigning the {{ip}} IP block to the {{organisation}} organisation... This may take a few minutes
ipBlockInformationOrgUpdateErrorMessage: An error occurred while assigning the {{ip}} IP block to the {{organisation}} organisation: {{error}}
